text: ‘Arau tumi amara babe e'i prthiraita kalyana likhi diya arau akhiraatato. Niscaya ami tomara ocaralai ubhati ahicho’. Allahe ka’le, ‘mora sasti yaka iccha di thako arau mora daya- seyato pratyeka bastuke'i ararai ache. Gatike ma'i se'ito likhi dima kerala sihamtara babe yisakale takbaraa aralambana karae, yakata pradana karae arau amara ayatasamuhata bisbasa sthapana karae’
